CustomAttribute.description: A custom attribute for Pandoc's `Block`s and `Inline`s with an `Attr` (`CodeBlock`, `Header`, `Table`, `Figure`, `TableHead`, `TableBody`,  `TableFoot`, `Row`, `Cell`, `Code`, `Link`, `Image`, `Span`).

name.description: the name of the attribute (the key in the attributes of `Attr`)

values.description: fixed set of values, the attribute value MUST be among these

CustomStyleDef.description:
The definition of a custom style in the configuration files of the editor; a style definition can be shared by many customizable elements: `{ appliesTo: ["span", "paragraph", "div"] }` means that the style is appliable to:
- `span` Marks (via the `customStyle` attr),
- `paragraph` Nodes (through the same attr),
- `div` Nodes (through a class in the `classes` attribute)

appliesTo.description: Elements to which this style applies.

attributes.description: Custom attributes that are meaningful only when this custom style is set (only for elements with an `Attr`).

classes.description: Custom classes that are meaningful only when this custom style is set (only for elements with an `Attr`).

css.description: CSS properties of this style (alternative to using a CSS stylesheet in the configuration).

deprecatedFor.description: In case a style is deprecated, at least for a particular  {@link  CustomizableElement } .

name.description: This becomes the value of the `custom-style` property or a class name.

CustomizableElement.description: The type names of `Node`s and `Mark`s (representing Pandoc `Block`s or `Inline`s) that can be customized through a custom style or a custom class. The custom style will be stored in the `custom-style` attribute of the element `Attr`, the custom class will be one of the `classes` of the element `Attr`.
